description: Sum of all digits in all base b representations for n, for 2<=b<=n.
references: J.-C. Puchta, J. Spilker, Altes und Neues zur Quersumme, Math. Semesterber., 49 (2002), 209-226.
V. Shevelev, Compact integers and factorials, Acta Arith. 126 (2007), no.3, 195-236 (cf. p.205).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
formula: a(n) = (n-1)*n - sum(i=2..n, (i-1)*sum(r>=1, floor(n/i^r) ) );a(n) <= (n-1)^2*log(n+1)/log(n). Problem: find a better upper estimate. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Jun 03 2011
author: _Clark Kimberling_
